attributes.action: Review, overhaul and improve all mental health services in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The current system is not working.
attributes.background: I want attention to be brought to all mental health services across the UK! We can do better! Things have to be better for people who need mental health support especially ones who are asking for the help.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about mental health services, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Also, the UK Government is only responsible for mental health services in England, services in other parts of the UK are a matter for the devolved administrations.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Fund preventative mental health sessions in schools and workplaces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562785

Increased funding/support to Children and Young People's mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558759

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
